sentences.en: Judges were unwilling to nullify government decisions.
sentences.cn: 法官们不愿废止政府决定。

sentences.en: An unhealthy diet will nullify the effects of training.
sentences.cn: 不健康的饮食会抵消锻炼的效果。

sentences.en: They knew the courts could nullify the marriage before the ink was dry.
sentences.cn: 他们知道法庭可以在签订婚约的墨汁未干之前，宣布婚姻无效。
